title: Ticket #6248: Python bindings missing for recent condor_history features
description: The python bindings need the ability to limit condor history queries to a particular event. This functionality was recently added. However, the python binding do not have access to it.
remarks:
2017-May-11 10:43:28 by johnkn:
the python bindings schedd.history method will take an optional since argument that can be either an integer, string or, expression.

If it is a string, then it can either be a cluster id, job id or expression, if it is an integer, it will be treated as a cluster id.

2017-Jun-19 11:04:13 by johnkn:
since needs an explict check for Nothing and should treat all other non-supported types as an error.
derived_tickets: #6410   Document python bindings limit history feature
check_ins:
2017-Jun-22 13:29   Check-in [51796]: fix python bindings schedd.history method to throw if since is of unknown type. #6248 (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
2017-May-11 10:40   Check-in [50633]: add optional since argument to python bindings schedd.history method. #6248 this commit also adds named arguments for all of the history method's arguments. ===VersionHistory:Pending=== (By John (TJ) Knoeller )
creator: tim
